Configure Project/Login Sources

Use the Configure Project dialog box (Admin | Configure Project | General Tab | Security | Login Sources) to set the sources from which Serena ChangeMan Version Manager obtains user identification. Valid login sources are: Host ID, LDAP ID, Login Dialog, Netware ID, VCS ID, and WNET ID.

Field Descriptions

Security | Login Sources
Login Sources Select the appropriate login sources for your configuration.
Up Arrow Use the Up Arrow to arrange the login sources in the desired order. The order that you define here is the order in which Version Manager searches for user IDs.
Down Arrow Use the Down Arrow to arrange the login sources in the desired order.
Auto create users with these default privileges This check box has a one-to-one relationship with each login source. First, select a login source.Select this check box to have the selected login source automatically create user IDs in the access control database. Specify the default privileges that will be assigned to the User, or click the Browse button to select them. By default, the Host ID login source automatically creates user IDs in the access control database and assigns them the Unlimited privilege set.
Case Sensitive User ID Select this check box to make user IDs case-sensitive. By default, user IDs are not case sensitive.
Enable Single Sign-on Select to enable single sign-on access to the selected project or project database.

NOTE To use single sign-on, your Version Manager user ID and O/S user ID must match.
